price: Göklerin ve yerin Rabbi, arşın Rabbi onların vasıflandırmalarından münezzehtir.
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
